name: Six Deg, Inc.
description: Developer of a social learning platform designed to promote and improve peer learning outcomes for students. The company's platform forms a social layer on top of existing enterprise learning systems to build engaging learning experiences privately and securely and helps to turn their classroom into a collaborative learning community, enabling institutions and universities to increase students' knowledge of current affairs and increase engagement and retention.
one_liner: Developer of a social learning platform designed to promote and improve peer learning outcomes for students. The company's platform forms a social layer on top of existing enterprise learning systems to build engaging learning experiences privately and securely and helps to turn their classroom into a collaborative learning community, enabling institutions and universities to increase students' knowledge of current affairs and increase engagement and retention.
